Class Utils

extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains various utility functions used throughout the system.

      • filter

        public static <S> java.util.List<S> filter(java.util.List<? extends java.lang.Object> in,
                           java.lang.Class<S> clazz)
        Returns a list containing only the elements of the given class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - ClassType to filter by.
        Parameters:
        in - The original list
        clazz - The class to filter by
        Returns:
        a list containing all elements of type clazz that were in in

      • filter

        public static <K,S> java.util.Map<K,S> filter(java.util.Map<K,? extends java.lang.Object> in,
                              java.lang.Class<S> clazz)

        Type Parameters:
        K - Key-class to create new Map with
        S - Value-class to create Map and filter with.
        Parameters:
        in - The original map
        clazz - The class to filter by
        Returns:
        a map containing all elements of type clazz that were in in

      • castUp

        public static <S,O extends S> java.util.List<S> castUp(java.util.List<O> in,
                                       java.lang.Class<S> clazz)
        Gives back the list with all elements casted to a given class.
        Type Parameters:
        S - type to cast up to.
        O - basetype to cast from.
        Parameters:
        in - the original list
        clazz - The class to cast the elements to (must be a superclass of the elements in the original list)
        Returns:
        a new list with all elements casted to clazz

        public static boolean testEmpty(java.lang.String str)
        Checks whether a string is empty
        Parameters:

      • getAnswer

        public static <O,S extends PublicArgument<O>> O getAnswer(java.lang.Class<S> clazz,
                                          java.lang.String description,
                                          PublicArgument arg)
                   throws ArgumentIsNullException,
                          WrongArgumentListException,
                          ArgumentNotAnsweredException
        A safe method of reading the answer to an Argument-object
        Type Parameters:
        S - Type clazz must have.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the Argument-type used
        description - the question answered by this Argument
        arg - the Argument from which to get the answer
        Returns:
        the parsed value of the answer
        Throws:
        ArgumentIsNullException - the given Argument is null
        WrongArgumentListException - the given Argument differs from the type specified by clazz
        ArgumentNotAnsweredException - the given Argument was not yet anwered

        This method merges two arrays in one
        Parameters:
        first, - the first part of the new array
        second, - the second part of the new array
